editeur.controller

Interface IControllerInput

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControllerInput

    public interface IControllerInput
    The interface IControllerInput. The role of this interface is to manage the different mouse or keyboard specifics control on this app. Like moving a shape with the mouse, adding it to the toolbar ... Works with the Mediator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MouseClickEvent(boolean fromToolbar, int clickSide, Point old, Point to)
      Mouse click event: manage the current mouseEvent.
      void MouseClickEventAddTool(boolean fromToolbar, int clickSide, Point old, Point to)
      Mouse click event for adding a tool ( a shape in the toolbar.)
      void MouseDraggedEvent(boolean fromToolbar, int clickSide, Point old, Point to)
      Mouse dragged event: Simply drag a shape from toolbar at old position and clone it to to position in whiteboard.
      void MouseTrashEvent(boolean fromToolbar, int clickSide, Point old, Point to)
      Mouse trash event : Handle the deletion of shape at old position put in trash
      boolean ShowDraggedShape(boolean fromToolbar, Point old, Point to)
      Show dragged shape boolean : Draw the current dragged shape, disclaimer, a temporary clone is moved until we reach destination.

    • Method Detail

      • MouseClickEvent

        void MouseClickEvent(boolean fromToolbar,
                     int clickSide,
                     Point old,
                     Point to)
        Mouse click event: manage the current mouseEvent. Move the shape pointed by old point to to position. Else select the shapes contains in a rectangle from old to to position.
        Parameters:
        fromToolbar - the boolean from toolbar indicates if the point is from toolbar.
        clickSide - the click side
        old - the old position
        to - the to position

      • MouseClickEventAddTool

        void MouseClickEventAddTool(boolean fromToolbar,
                            int clickSide,
                            Point old,
                            Point to)
        Mouse click event for adding a tool ( a shape in the toolbar.) Simply clone and add the cloned shape at old position if exists and add it to the to position. Does nothing if from toolbar
        Parameters:
        fromToolbar - the boolean from toolbar indicates if the point is from toolbar.
        clickSide - the click side
        old - the old position
        to - the to position

      • MouseDraggedEvent

        void MouseDraggedEvent(boolean fromToolbar,
                       int clickSide,
                       Point old,
                       Point to)
        Mouse dragged event: Simply drag a shape from toolbar at old position and clone it to to position in whiteboard.
        Parameters:
        fromToolbar - the boolean from toolbar indicates if the point is from toolbar.
        clickSide - the click side
        old - the old position
        to - the to position

      • MouseTrashEvent

        void MouseTrashEvent(boolean fromToolbar,
                     int clickSide,
                     Point old,
                     Point to)
        Mouse trash event : Handle the deletion of shape at old position put in trash
        Parameters:
        fromToolbar - the boolean from toolbar indicates if the point is from toolbar.
        clickSide - the click side
        old - the old position
        to - the to position

      • ShowDraggedShape

        boolean ShowDraggedShape(boolean fromToolbar,
                         Point old,
                         Point to)
        Show dragged shape boolean : Draw the current dragged shape, disclaimer, a temporary clone is moved until we reach destination.
        Parameters:
        fromToolbar - the boolean from toolbar indicates if the point is from toolbar.
        old - the old position
        to - the to position
        Returns:
        the boolean : false if we dragged nothing.
